bec59a61-cabe-4eb6-9232-14d4dc175d76.description: The HBA mentoring program is a regional 7-month program to further the development of HBA members, and of our industry as a whole, by advancing the presence and influence of women in all sectors of healthcare including biotechnology, pharmaceuticals and medical devices. HBA Mentors volunteer their time to play a facilitator role by providing guidance, offering feedback, and helping mentees gain insights to further advance their careers.
bec59a61-cabe-4eb6-9232-14d4dc175d76.name: HBA Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Be a senior leader with significant experience in the healthcare industry or related services.

Demonstrate a willingness to share of oneself — relaying stories and anecdotes from his or her career, recounting successes and failures, offering ideas and approaches and identifying tools and connections
Participate in monthly mentoring circle meetings to share expertise and give guidance to mentees.

skills.name: Career Development And Mentoring Across Generations

7ea47d86-ab24-4c1b-8579-f22af069376a.description: The Honored Volunteer award rewards an HBA volunteer who has demonstrated outstanding service to the chapter/region. Typically offered on a monthly or quarterly basis, this award recognizes volunteers who show strong commitment to the HBA, make an outstanding volunteer contribution, and have high energy and positive attitude.
7ea47d86-ab24-4c1b-8579-f22af069376a.name: HBA Honored Volunteer

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Show strong committment to the HBA
Make an outstanding volunteer contribution to the HBA chapter or region
Go above and beyond with a high level of energy and positive attitude

5861dc76-480d-4caa-b77e-38b3cb7f139f.description: The Spark award is a peer-to-peer recognition program which honors any HBA volunteer who has distinguished themselves through “little bursts of awesomeness” in areas such as attitude, collaboration, pitching in, consistency, leadership and building community by supporting others
5861dc76-480d-4caa-b77e-38b3cb7f139f.name: HBA Spark Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Distinguish oneself by displaying a positive attitude, collaborating with other volunteer leaders, and demonstrating consistent excellence.
Display supportive leadership skills to build the HBA volunteer community.

f2f4fbc6-6318-4cad-a353-5b6c20fd9ec5.description: HBA Rising Stars are professionals in the early to mid-stage of their career. They represent various sectors of the healthcare industry and are recognized as top talent within their organization.
f2f4fbc6-6318-4cad-a353-5b6c20fd9ec5.name: HBA Rising Star Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Designated by HBA's Corporate Partner organizations as an employee who contributes significantly to her organization
Exhibits dedication to the healthcare industry
Exemplifies leadership and is a role model for others

63b5b1d9-3ec7-4aec-938b-c137b0b5a65d.description: HBA Luminaries are professionals who have made a significant impact on the healthcare industry and have a proven track record of helping advance the careers of other women.
63b5b1d9-3ec7-4aec-938b-c137b0b5a65d.name: HBA Luminary Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Designated by HBA's Corporate Partner organizations as an employee who contributes significantly to her organization
Exhibits dedication to the healthcare industry
Exemplifies leadership and is a role model for others

2e97ddbd-6250-4c95-bfdf-ab0981cfb754.description: The Everest award honors a significant accomplishment that went above and beyond the call of duty or was considered previously impossible. The recipient has shown a willingness to go the extra mile to improve the HBA and extended themselves to help others with a high degree of excellence, professionalism, positivity and integrity in their work. The winner overcame a significant challenge and/or made a sacrifice to ensure an initiative, program and/or project was executed properly.
2e97ddbd-6250-4c95-bfdf-ab0981cfb754.name: HBA Everest Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Serve as a volunteer leader within a region or chapter of the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association for at least one year
Lead a team, encouraging collaboration and teamwork, to accomplish significant transformational change for the benefit of peers and organization
Overcome a significant challenge, using new and creative solutions to ensure an initiative, program,  and/or project is executed properly.

e4ea11c8-bb0f-4905-be55-550b7be11363.description: The Healthcare Businesswomen’s Association’s prestigious ACE Awards program recognizes exemplary leadership initiatives that advance and enhance the careers of women. Winning companies have committed to realizing the full potential of their female talent by fostering programs that deliver impactful and measurable results.
e4ea11c8-bb0f-4905-be55-550b7be11363.name: HBA ACE Award Employee

badge_template_activities.title: A demonstrated commitment to ensuring that gender diversity and leadership opportunities for women are part of the company's organizational DNA.
A current effective and successful exemplary workplace initiative that is working to remove obstacles for women, close the gender gap and accelerate gender parity
• Measurable results, increased business performance, examples of stewardship, successful execution, and sustainability of the initiative.

f43ced3d-3f44-4f85-8ce6-f01446686e7b.description: The Leadership, Excellence and Dedication (L.E.A.D.) award is the highest honor an HBA volunteer can receive within their chapter or region. The L.E.A.D. award recipient has demonstrated excellence via sustained contributions at a regional level, positively impacted the region and ongoing success, and shown dedication to the HBA mission of furthering the advancement and impact of women in healthcare worldwide.
f43ced3d-3f44-4f85-8ce6-f01446686e7b.name: HBA L.E.A.D. Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Serve as a volunteer leader within a region or chapter of the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association for at least one year
Develop and implement strategy related to Member and Volunteer Engagement, Corporate Relations, Programming, Marketing, or General Operations

d00e9d87-c710-4235-bb80-d2670296ad96.description: The Marie Curie award recognizes an innovation (a program, project, process, solution or strategy) that has had a significant impact on the chapter or region. The recipient has followed through on this innovation from concept to implementation and has had a clear and measurable impact on the chapter/region or the HBA overall.
d00e9d87-c710-4235-bb80-d2670296ad96.name: HBA Marie Curie Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Serve as a volunteer leader within a region or chapter of the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association for at least one year
Conceive an innovative, imaginative or creative idea to drive the organization forward; come up with creative, new ways of doing things
Add value by way of a new or improved process method, system, program or service (or reduction in costs) for their team or the organization overall

Develop the idea from general concepts into action plans; swiftly move from ideas to implementation. Determine if ideas will work in operation and consider constraints that limit innovation while finding ways to make the most out of existing resources

156f1c6a-b4c1-47d1-8f65-931bc487d398.description: Certificate recipients have completed training and demonstrated mastery in core competencies necessary for effective business partnering and cross functional collaboration in support of corporate wide digital initiatives, improving individual and team performance. Certificate holders are better equipped to help design, build compelling business cases and support the successful implementation of digital initiatives in the regulated pharmaceutical and bio-pharmaceutical industries.
156f1c6a-b4c1-47d1-8f65-931bc487d398.name: HBA Business Partnering for Digital Innovation Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and actively participate in a 12 week virtual training  program which includes a cadence of webinars and live discussion sessions with industry and government subject matter experts.
Complete pre- and post-assessments of individual confidence and effectiveness levels. Achieve a passing score of 100% on the final content exam

5436261e-de90-4b7b-b483-b9419b3bd959.description: The Legacy award is presented to an HBA volunteer who has consistently demonstrated outstanding service and long-term contributions to HBA over five years. The recipient has been involved as a leader of multiple committee(s)/projects during the course of their volunteering.
5436261e-de90-4b7b-b483-b9419b3bd959.name: HBA Legacy Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Serve as a volunteer leader within a region or chapter of the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association for at least one year
Achieve a minimum of 5 key accomplishments that highlight outstanding service to the HBA

006c0fb3-488d-40ec-a207-24d8dff296f1.description: This badge is a global recognition given to an HBA leader who served on the Global Board of Directors. This individual exemplified effective leadership and dedication to the mission of the HBA and had a measurable impact on the HBA global organization, chapter operations, members and/or corporate partners.
006c0fb3-488d-40ec-a207-24d8dff296f1.name: Past HBA Global Board of Directors

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association.
Complete service on the HBA Global Board of Directors.
Develop and implement strategy that positively impacts the overall HBA organization.

b826991a-3920-4d4e-aa43-c5cdbdf31573.description: This award recognizes an entire regional council that has excelled in an area of regional operations, exceeding the HBA’s membership and/or financial targets while supporting and leading the HBA chapters within the region.
b826991a-3920-4d4e-aa43-c5cdbdf31573.name: HBA Regional Excellence Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Develop and implement strategy related to Member and Volunteer Engagement, Corporate Relations, Programming, Marketing, and General Operations

Through execution of event planning, corporate relations, marketing and membership engagement strategy, meet or exceed key performance indicators in the areas of membership, event attendance, and financial health.

3202876d-d293-400b-8699-ae02ac098ab7.description: This award recognizes an entire chapter board that has excelled in an area of chapter operations, exceeding the HBA’s membership and/or financial targets and the chapter’s own expectations.
3202876d-d293-400b-8699-ae02ac098ab7.name: HBA Chapter Excellence Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Develop and implement strategy related to Member and Volunteer Engagement, Corporate Relations, Programming, Marketing, and General Operations

Through execution of event planning, corporate relations, marketing and membership engagement strategy, meet or exceed key performance indicators in the areas of membership, event attendance, and financial health.

7390513d-35a5-432b-8266-8249dee78cf4.description: The Innovation Award recognizes the development and implementation of a high-impact innovation by HBA staff. The innovation has positively impacted the association, membership, corporate partner community and HBA mission.
7390513d-35a5-432b-8266-8249dee78cf4.name: HBA Staff Innovation Award

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a completed project which has positively impacted the HBA's key performance indicators, sustainability, and value.
Demonstrate project management best practices and cross-functional collaboration to bring the project to completion.

fe1793c3-937b-4309-bac8-cde66c0f70cb.description: The Key Liaison award honors HBA Corporate Partner Liaison volunteers who have demonstrated excellence via sustained teamwork, significant contributions to Corporate Partner engagement, displayed leadership in owning the HBA relationship, exhibited problem-solving and conflict resolution skills, and shown dedication to the HBA mission of furthering the advancement and impact of women in healthcare.
fe1793c3-937b-4309-bac8-cde66c0f70cb.name: HBA Key Liaison Award

badge_template_activities.title: The Corporate Partner Liaison holds a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Has served as the volunteer Key Liaison for at least one year
Develops and implements strategy to engage HBA members, supports HBA programming, flagship events, regional events, and has sponsored, attended (registered) for a central and/or regional event
Has launched and/or is launching one Ambassador Program if they are a Silver, Gold, or Purple Corporate Partner.

f86ec2e5-5b2a-4edb-bfcd-c21880f129c6.description: This award recognizes a demonstration of commitment, passion and a drive for results that lead to the creation of a new process, product, service or level of recognition for HBA that has or will have a positive benefit to the association and/or a chapter's operations.
f86ec2e5-5b2a-4edb-bfcd-c21880f129c6.name: HBA Innovation Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association

9e11616d-b6c4-4800-866f-705ac02de7b0.description: The HBA Leadership Achievement Award is given to a volunteer who has demonstrated consistent leadership that positively impacted their HBA chapter or region, fostered collaboration, and promoted overall excellence in furthering the HBA mission.
9e11616d-b6c4-4800-866f-705ac02de7b0.name: HBA Leadership Achievement Award

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Serve as leader of a  region or chapter of the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association for at least one year.
Provide executive leadership and oversight of the entire HBA component, including Member and Volunteer Engagement, Corporate Relations, Programming, Marketing, and General Operations.

d87f6ce3-3183-4626-9969-e5328ea5e783.description: The HBA Programming Achievement Award is given to a volunteer who has demonstrated consistent leadership that positively impacted their functional area (Programming), fostered collaboration, and promoted overall excellence in furthering the HBA mission.
d87f6ce3-3183-4626-9969-e5328ea5e783.name: HBA Programming Achievement Award

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Serve as a leader within the programs area of the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association for at least one year.
Plan and implement annual programs strategy for the HBA chapter and/or region, including educational content selection, networking events, and membership outreach events.
Manage program logistics, secure location and event sponsorship, coordinate event marketing and communication.
Manage a committee of volunteers dedicated to program and event operations. Ensure committee members have the tools, resources and training needed to successfully execute program and event planning.

7e04cfa1-06aa-41dc-8512-4e5d153a5181.description: The Force for Change Award recognizes an HBA staff project or initiative that made a positive impact on the association community or mission to further the advancement and impact of women in the business of healthcare.
7e04cfa1-06aa-41dc-8512-4e5d153a5181.name: HBA Staff Force for Change Award

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a completed project which has positively impacted the HBA's key performance indicators, sustainability, and value.
Demonstrate project management best practices and cross-functional collaboration to bring the project to completion.

de8fa247-009e-4bc8-ba3b-d2aee844ceb9.description: The Operational Excellence Award recognizes a high-efficiency process, project, or new way of working that significantly increases the quality and efficiency of the HBA's internal or external operations.
de8fa247-009e-4bc8-ba3b-d2aee844ceb9.name: HBA Staff Operational Excellence Award

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a completed project which has positively impacted the HBA's key performance indicators, sustainability, and value.
Demonstrate project management best practices and cross-functional collaboration to bring the project to completion.

16897f6b-9eea-4234-939d-fa3de88a6e1a.description: This award is a global recognition given to an HBA leader who exemplified effective leadership and dedication to the mission of the HBA and had a measurable impact on the HBA global organization, chapter operations, members and/or corporate partners.
16897f6b-9eea-4234-939d-fa3de88a6e1a.name: HBA Chair Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Develop and implement strategy that positively impacts the overall HBA organization.

23894b90-3cda-44a5-8b43-7a3d89673566.description: The HBA Engagement Achievement Award is given to a volunteer who has demonstrated consistent leadership that positively impacted their functional area (Membership and Volunteer Engagement), fostered collaboration, and promoted overall excellence in furthering the HBA mission.
23894b90-3cda-44a5-8b43-7a3d89673566.name: HBA Engagement Achievement Award

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Serve as a leader within the membership and volunteer engagement area of the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association for at least one year.
Using membership and attendance data, develop and implement strategy to recruit, retain, and engage HBA members and volunteers.
Organize and execute HBA volunteer awards program within the chapter and/or region, including nomination process, management of the voting process, and communication and promotion of award winners.
Manage a committee of volunteers dedicated to promotion of HBA membership and volunteerism.

05b877cb-3c44-4cb9-b06b-b442c0fecfca.description: The HBA Marketing and Communications Achievement Award is given to a volunteer who has demonstrated consistent leadership that positively impacted their functional area (Marketing and Communications), fostered collaboration, and promoted overall excellence in furthering the HBA mission.
05b877cb-3c44-4cb9-b06b-b442c0fecfca.name: HBA Marketing and Communications Achievement Award

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Serve as a leader within the marketing and communications area of the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association for at least one year
Develop and implement strategy for the promotion of chapter and regional events, mentoring programs, and association membership
Manage communication to region and chapter HBA members and prospects, including content development, social media strategy, and other digital communication initiatives
Manage a committee of volunteers dedicated to marketing and communication of HBA initiatives

383b7bff-6c38-4724-83d3-08844f0ac25d.description: The HBA Above and Beyond award is given in thanks for exemplary service to the HBA and recognizes an organization's contribution to the association.
383b7bff-6c38-4724-83d3-08844f0ac25d.name: HBA Above and Beyond Award

badge_template_activities.title: Greatly contribute to the HBA through exemplary service that goes far above and beyond the call of duty.

f08fca4f-4037-4ec4-a304-7ffcd8415833.description: The HBA Above and Beyond award is given in thanks for exemplary service to the HBA and recognizes a volunteer leader who greatly contributed to the organization.
f08fca4f-4037-4ec4-a304-7ffcd8415833.name: HBA Above and Beyond Award

badge_template_activities.title: Greatly contribute to the HBA through exemplary service that goes far above and beyond the call of duty.

0a231cf1-09d3-445e-a0cd-d92ebbb05c6e.description: This annual leadership award recognizes an individual who has brought awareness to their local HBA chapter and the organization at large. This is accomplished through marketing and public relations opportunities as well as collaborations through corporate partners.
0a231cf1-09d3-445e-a0cd-d92ebbb05c6e.name: HBA Advocate Award

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Go above and beyond to raise awareness of the HBA through professional speaking and media opportunities
Set strategy to target various industry sectors to establish relationships and awareness

078822a0-8336-4427-be81-b29deb55de8f.description: The HBA Corporate Relations Achievement Award is given to a volunteer who has demonstrated consistent leadership that positively impacted their functional area (Corporate Relations), fostered collaboration, and promoted overall excellence in furthering the HBA mission.
078822a0-8336-4427-be81-b29deb55de8f.name: HBA Corporate Relations Achievement Award

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association
Serve as a leader within the membership and volunteer engagement area of the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association for at least one year
Develop and implement business development, engagement and/or sponsorship strategies to increase company and individual engagement with HBA
Manage a committee of volunteers dedicated to promoting HBA and engaging HBA corporate customers with our organization

b9ac6b66-b93a-4b1e-ac67-eee4a4445033.description: The Healthcare Businesswomen’s Association’s prestigious ACE Awards program recognizes exemplary leadership initiatives that advance and enhance the careers of women. Winning companies have committed to realizing the full potential of their female talent by fostering programs that deliver impactful and measurable results.
b9ac6b66-b93a-4b1e-ac67-eee4a4445033.name: HBA ACE Award

badge_template_activities.title: A demonstrated commitment to ensuring that gender diversity and leadership opportunities for women are part of the company's organizational DNA.
A current effective and successful exemplary workplace initiative that is working to remove obstacles for women, close the gender gap and accelerate gender parity
• Measurable results, increased business performance, examples of stewardship, successful execution, and sustainability of the initiative.

d0ec216f-e53a-4868-84d2-42c0178ed76f.description: HOPE is an accelerated one-year leadership program for HBA Corporate Partners designed to help support and advance the careers of mid- to senior-level, high-potential talent in underrepresented/underestimated groups (i.e., LGBTQ+, women of color, women with ability diversity).The program aims to provide access and opportunity through career coaching, mentoring, networking, professional development, and volunteering. At its core, HOPE focuses on the emotional intelligence leadership (EIL) theory.
d0ec216f-e53a-4868-84d2-42c0178ed76f.name: HBA HOPE Program Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association.
Be a senior leader with significant experience in the healthcare industry or related services.

Demonstrate a willingness to share of oneself — relaying stories and anecdotes from his or her career, recounting successes and failures, offering ideas and approaches and identifying tools and connections.
Participate in mentoring meetings and educational webinars to share expertise and offer professional guidance to HOPE scholars.

fc643d0a-3000-4339-869b-0881eecd3778.description: HOPE is an accelerated one-year leadership program for HBA Corporate Partners designed to help support and advance the careers of mid- to senior-level, high-potential talent in underrepresented/underestimated groups (i.e., LGBTQ+, women of color, women with ability diversity).The program aims to provide access and opportunity through career coaching, mentoring, networking, professional development, and volunteering. At its core, HOPE focuses on the emotional intelligence leadership (EIL) theory.
fc643d0a-3000-4339-869b-0881eecd3778.name: HBA Hope Program Scholar

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a current membership in the Healthcare Businesswomen's Association.
Be a mid to senior level leader with experience in the healthcare industry or related services.
Demonstrate a willingness to share of oneself — authentically participate in open and honest conversations about one’s professional and personal challenges and triumphs.
Participate in mentoring meetings, coaching sessions, and educational webinars to share, connect, and develop one’s own leadership skills and executive mindset.
